content: Hi! Could someone how knows the hapi people (I couldnt find any email or support outside github) tip them that the test server http://hapi.fhir.org/hapi-fhir-jpaserver/resource?serverId=home_r4&pretty=false&resource=RelatedPerson deos not work for any resource, I only get a 404, and have been for some days
Looks like it works if I remove /hapi-fhir-jpaserver after clicking on a resource, looks like some server configuration error?

Hello! I'm new here, trying to access the hapi test server for a course I'm participating in. Looks like the site is down, is this normal?

Thank you!
Alyssa Darden has marked this topic as resolved.

Currently the request http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/Condition?subject.family=Heckmann yields a HTTP 500 result.
Is there an issue with chaining...? It worked last week....

<issue>
    <severity value="error"/>
    <code value="processing"/>
    <diagnostics value="ERROR: canceling statement due to user request"/>
</issue>
This appears to happen with all forward chaining request
Might be best to raise on #hapi
